(Simplified: 觋)
Chinese Definition:
Ideographic: One who learns 見 magic 巫
  • ⿰ Left to right

    • 見 [ jiàn ] to see, to observe, to meet, to appear

覡字的基本解释

覡
xī
见“觋”。

覡字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xí］
［《廣韻》胡狄切，入錫，匣。］
亦作“擊2”。“觋1”的繁体字。
为人祷祝鬼神的男巫。后亦泛指巫师。

覡字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【見字部】　覡； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1135第23
【唐韻】胡狄切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?狄切，?音檄。【說文】能齋肅事神明也。在男曰覡，在女曰巫。【徐鍇曰】能見神也。【周禮·春官·神仕疏】男陽有兩稱，曰巫，曰覡。女隂不變，直名巫，無覡稱。【後漢·張衡傳】或察巫覡之言。【北史·齊幼主紀】雅信巫覡，解禱無方。　又【集韻】或作擊。【荀子·王制篇】傴巫跛擊之事。【註】擊，讀爲覡。男巫也。　又【集韻】下革切，音覈。義同。

wizard

wizard
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xí］
["Guangyun" Hu Diqie, into tin, box. ]
Also known as "hit 2". Traditional characters for "觋1".
A wizard who prays for ghosts and gods. Later also refers to wizards in general.
wizard
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [See the Department of Words] 　觋; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1135 Page 23
[Tang Yun] Hu Diqie [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Di Qi,? Yin Miao. [Said the text] Neng Zhai Su Shi God also. In the male it is covet, in the female it is the witch. [Xu Kai said] I can see God. [Zhou Li·Chun Guan·Shen Shi Shu] There are two names for male yang, namely witch and cowardice. The female yin remains the same, and she is known as a witch without any cowardice. [The Story of Zhang Heng in the Later Han Dynasty] or the words of Cha Witch. [Northern History·Qi Youzhu Ji] Yaxin witch covets, there is no way to pray.　 [Ji Yun] or strike. 【Xunzi·The King System】The witch limp. [Note] Hit, read as coquettish. Wizards too.　[Jiyun] Next leather cut, sound core. The same meaning.
